newsitem.title: INDIA: Indian budget to be passed in May, says official.
newsitem.headline: Indian budget to be passed in May, says official.

text.p: The pathbreaking 1997/98 (April-March) budget, presented by former finance minister P. Chidambaram in February, was expected to be passed by parliament in the first week of May, a government official said on Monday.
"I have reasonable expectation that it (budget) will be passed in the first week of May," Cabinet Secretary T.S.R. Subramaniam told a business conference.
"I am hopeful on the budget pending before parliament," he said.
